title: Ep. 398 - Why Do We Defend Fredo?
description:
Many conservatives take CNN’s side, and President Trump is furious. We’ll explain two different approaches to politics. Then, Trump wants gun control, a prominent Evangelical musician loses faith, and more details emerge about Jeffrey Epstein. Date: 08-014-2019
